name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程談述物理, 內容包括以下主題：1.力學 2.能量守恆
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Units and vectors 
3. Motion along a straight line
4. Motion along a straight line
5. Motion in two and three dimension
6. Motion in two and three dimension
7. Exam 1
8. Newton's laws of motion
9. Applying Newton's laws of motion
10. Applying Newton's laws of motion
11. Applying Newton's laws of motion
12. Exam 2
13. Work and kinetic energy
14. Work and kinetic energy
15. Potential energy and energy conservation
16. Potential energy and energy conservation
17. Review
18. Exam 3
materials:
教課書
University Physics by Young and Freedman, 14th ED, Vol. 1 (高立圖書）
